name: Hecahands Breus
effectText: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Hecahands Breus" once per turn. If a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand (except during the Draw Phase or Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can look at 1 random card in your opponent's hand, then if it is a monster, you can Special Summon it to your field.
